text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock He’s had it. Why does he need to be safe? Do any of them really care if people catch COVID-19 now.                                                       It back to normal now and ‘sod everyone else!’  Waiting for the next update on ‘clinically extremely vulnerable’ group.
